Notes

  • 8-bit C1 control codes support

Key Map Escapes

All symbols are represented in the UTF-16 encoding and will be converted to the output stream in accordance with the terminal character set.

  • \\\\ — `\\\'
  • \\{000-377} — Octal symbol code
  • \\u{0000-FFFF} — Hexidecimal symbol code
  • \\e — Escape (\\u001B)
  • \\a — Bell (\\u0007)
  • \\b — Backspace (\\u0008)
  • \\t — Tab (\\u0009)
  • \\n — LF (\\u000A)
  • \\v — Vertical tab (\\u000B)
  • \\f — Form Feed (\\u000C)
  • \\r — CR (\\u000D)
